description: Schillinger System implementation completeness manifest. Tracks which features are implemented and have CI enforcement.

principles.enforcement: All features marked 'implemented' must have passing CI tests that prove they affect musical output.
principles.promotion: A feature can only be marked 'implemented' when: (1) it writes to StructuralTension, (2) causes measurable musical difference, (3) has CI test, (4) survives looped render.
principles.mathOnly: Features that are 'mathOnly' have algorithmic implementation but no agency/write access to tension.

resultants_live.description: Rhythmic resultants as generators (not just analysis)
resultants_live.notes: RhythmicResultantsGenerator wraps math with tension integration. CI enforced: 43 tests

phase_interference.description: Persistent phase drift as motion (not microtiming/jitter)
phase_interference.notes: Phase drift accumulators per role, reset at phrase boundaries. CI enforced: 19 tests

structural_silence.notes: CI enforced: silence gates write rhythmic tension 0.7+

drill_tension.description: Drill fills increase measurable rhythmic tension
drill_tension.notes: CI enforced: drill writes tension that affects total

functional_tension.description: Harmonic analyzer writes tension based on chord function
functional_tension.notes: HarmonicAnalyzer with chord quality, functional analysis, and voice leading. CI enforced: 25 tests

counter_motion.description: Parameters move in opposition to create sophisticated texture
counter_motion.notes: Orthogonal parameter motion (density ↔ velocity, filter ↔ resonance). CI enforced: 24 tests

phrase_awareness.notes: CI enforced: phrase endings write higher formal tension

tension_driven_transitions.description: Section transitions respond to accumulated tension
tension_driven_transitions.notes: SectionTransitionManager with tension thresholds, energy-driven resolution, exhaustion overrides. CI enforced: 23 tests

long_cycle_memory.description: System remembers and avoids repeating previous tension peaks
long_cycle_memory.notes: LongCycleMemory with peak registry, similarity detection, alternative resolution strategies. CI enforced: 32 tests

structural_tension_unified.description: Single StructuralTension object aggregates all domains
structural_tension_unified.notes: CI enforced: tension aggregates with correct weights, clamping, etc.

tension_accumulator.description: Central TensionAccumulator manages state and history
tension_accumulator.notes: CI enforced: write methods, history tracking, explainability

automatic_resolution.description: System reduces tension after peak without manual input
automatic_resolution.notes: CI enforced: resolution logic drops tension automatically

explainability.description: All tension changes record musical cause for explanation
explainability.notes: CI enforced: explainCurrentState() provides musical reasoning

energy_curves.description: Energy has directionality, inertia, and exhaustion
energy_curves.notes: Separate from tension - energy tracks momentum vs pressure. CI enforced: 32 tests

register_motion.description: Register changes are structural, not ornamental
register_motion.notes: RegisterMotionManager with per-role register tracking, structural change detection, bass anchoring. CI enforced: 53 tests

orthogonal_parameters.description: Rhythm, harmony, density move independently but coherently
orthogonal_parameters.notes: Domain-level orthogonal motion (DomainOrthogonalMotionManager). Counter-motion rules: if rhythm ↑ then harmony ↓. CI enforced: 36 tests

demoPiece.title: Interference Study No. 1
demoPiece.description: 64-bar piece proving Schillinger completeness. If any subsystem is removed, piece audibly collapses.
